tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE air_traffic_control (
  communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  communication_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  frequency VARCHAR(50),
  pilot VARCHAR(100),
  message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE air_traffic_control (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_name VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_name VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE aircraft (
    aircraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    registration_number VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE air_traffic_control_communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  communication_text TEXT,
  communication_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE aircraft (
  aircraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_type VARCHAR(255),
  registration_number VARCHAR(10),
  airline VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE control_tower (
  tower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tower_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE flights (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  departure_airport_id INT,
  arrival_airport_id INT,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  communication_date DATE,
  flight_id INT,
  controller_id INT,
  communication_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE aircrafts (
    aircraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aircraft_type VARCHAR(50),
    aircraft_registration VARCHAR(20),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aircraft_id INT,
    flight_number VARCHAR(10),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_id INT,
    controller_id INT,
    communication_type VARCHAR(20),
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE airports (
    airport_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airport_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    runway_length INT,
    terminal_capacity INT
);
